resources.string: We are group of students from Ngee Ann Polytechnic. We created this app so that users like you can enjoy your own pace of cooking or baking. There are a few features that you may find interesting in this app.

• Upload Your Own Recipe 
 • Rate and Review your choice of recipe 
 • Update your Profile Picture and Username 
 • View Recipe History 
 • Like Your Favourite Recipe
We would love to hear from you! If you have any questions, Your can Reach us by:
\u2022 Email: rexipe@np.edu.sg \n \u2022 Phone Number: +65 8762 5678 \n \u2022 Address: Ngee Ann Polytechnic, 535 Clementi Road Singapore 59
